name: NeovimEssentials
description: Provide essentials features for neovim for devcontainers

git.description: If true, git will be installed

build_essential.description: If true, build essential will be installed

wget.description: If true, wget will be installed

curl.description: If true, curl will be installed

python3.description: If true, python3 will be installed

pip3.description: If true, pip3 will be installed

python_is_python3.description: If true, python-is-python3 will be installed

ripgrep.description: If true, ripgrep will be installed
